articles.title: Europe's Vega rocket crashes back to Earth - BBC
articles.description: Europe's premier small rocket fails in flight again - the third time in eight outings.

Europe's premier small rocket has failed in flight once again.
The Vega vehicle was lost 2.5 minutes into its latest mission from the Kourou spaceport in French Guiana.

articles.title: Study reveals warning signs of sudden cardiac arrests for preventive measures - Devdiscourse
